docs.lead_paragraph: To Azaratu Zakaria, Jimmy Carter's battle against the Guinea worm is represented by a scar.

headline.main: Health, Election Work Elevated Jimmy Carter Post-Presidency
headline.print_headline: Health, Election Work Elevated Jimmy Carter Post-Presidency

docs.snippet: To Azaratu Zakaria, Jimmy Carter's battle against the Guinea worm is represented by a scar.

docs.lead_paragraph: We must treat mental illness much more aggressively.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by Jeffrey A Lieberman points to failed American mental health system as contributing factor in instances of deadly violence like live murders of television reporter and cameraman by Vester Lee Flanagan; calls for wider application of laws that allow doctors to get court orders to force mentally ill to accept treatment.
docs.snippet: We must treat mental illness much more aggressively.
